attributes.action: Cancel SSP for pharmacist and chemist workers and companies should pay salaries
attributes.additional_details: The government should raise the sickness money from SSP to their salary amounts.
attributes.background:
There is sound advise for the general public to stay away from doctors and hospitals, but the next place people attend is pharmacists 

The staff are in termoil and are afraid to have time off as cannot support there families on SSP.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
